thread.title: BRIEF-U.S. Bankruptcy Court Approves Sempra Energy's Acquisition Of Oncor's Holding Company

title: BRIEF-U.S. Bankruptcy Court Approves Sempra Energy's Acquisition Of Oncor's Holding Company

organizations.name: brief-u.s. bankruptcy court approves sempra energy
brief-u.s. bankruptcy court approves sempra energy's acquisition of oncor

text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - Sempra Energy:
* U.S. BANKRUPTCY COURT APPROVES SEMPRA ENERGY‘S ACQUISITION OF ONCOR‘S HOLDING COMPANY
* SEMPRA ENERGY - U.S. BANKRUPTCY COURT FOR DISTRICT OF DELAWARE HAS CONFIRMED PLAN OF REORGANIZATION FOR ENERGY FUTURE HOLDINGS CORP
* SEMPRA ENERGY - U.S. BANKRUPTCY COURT ALSO GAVE FINAL APPROVAL FOR CO TO ACQUIRE EFH & ITS ABOUT 80-PERCENT OWNERSHIP INTEREST IN ONCOR ELECTRIC DELIVERY CO
* SEMPRA ENERGY - PUCT IS EXPECTED TO CONSIDER AN ORDER APPROVING SEMPRA ENERGY‘S AND ONCOR‘S JOINT CHANGE-IN-CONTROL APPLICATION AS EARLY AS MARCH 8 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
